title: FreeTrade
author: FreeTrade
content: I'm going to be launching a new coin soon - Membercoin.It'll be the main coin used by the web3 member.cash social network site so it'll automatically have a use.I need help in a few areas, especially help with a mining pool, WASM, RUST, and electrum server/block explorer. More details as they are released at https://member.cash/#show?start=0&limit=25&order=new&content=posts&filter=everyone&qaddress=-2124810688269680833If you have these or other skills and you'd like to be involved from the start, hit me up to discuss the details.

comments.author: unnamed0simple
comments.body: Ticker: HODL Symbol: Ä¦Well, what are you going to do about this? Have you finished this work already?

comments.author: Thecosmic
comments.body: Hey, I can help you with the pool for MemberCoin.cosmicpool. tk

comments.author: FreeTrade
comments.created_time: June 14, 2022, 04:21:16 AMLast edit: July 15, 2022, 02:08:44 AM by FreeTrade
comments.body: Quote from: vifzor on June 10, 2022, 06:59:19 AMHey I would love to help you! How can I reach you?Message athttps://member.cash/t/Member

comments.author: FreeTrade
comments.body: This launched successfully, and is currently very easy to CPU mine.https://github.com/memberapp/Membercoin/releases/tag/membercoinbetav1.9.1.2Check out the discord for questions.

comments.author: FreeTrade
comments.body: membercoin is now integrated into the member.cash site. You can earn membercoin by mining, but far more will be distributed to users of member.cash. I'm going to be heavily tipping the first users and testers of the site.Make sure you're on latest version (look for version 8.0.4 in the footer of member.cash)

comments.author: wanganxiu
comments.body: This project is very promising. I saw that the developer's Twitter was concerned by the boss of the coin security trading platform. There are several other boss

comments.author: FreeTrade
comments.body: Membercoin now support mining in the browser at member.cash. Click 'Start' -> 'Make New Phrase' -> 'Login' -> 'Mine Some Membercoin'Only takes about 10 seconds to get some.You can get your first few satoshis this way to start posting, then get tips for your content.

comments.author: FreeTrade
comments.body: Mining is a lot easier that that -try -https://member.cash/p/36625b331c

comments.author: wanganxiu
comments.body: You should publish the detailed information of your project coins. These, white papers, at present, you are very careless.

comments.body: More details at (General) https://member.cash/t/Member(Trading) https://member.cash/t/TradeMember(Mining) https://member.cash/t/MineMember

comments.author: LaaMos Seeth
comments.created_time: July 11, 2022, 11:41:36 AMLast edit: July 11, 2022, 11:52:32 AM by LaaMos Seeth
comments.body: Hi.I don't want to offend you, but your previous project was unsuccessful - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1317918.msg60216031#msg60216031What guarantees success here?At the moment, your social network member.cash is full of useless spam, fraud ads, odd pictures and so on. But if you begin to control this, this will destroy the decentralization of the ecosystem (coin+social).But, nevertheless, I would like to mine a little coins for interest. But the difficulty is already very high for solo mining - 156. The network speed is around 9600 MH/s. Given that Intel 10900 gives about 30 MH, it is about 300-500 miners on the network. Not so much, but a pool is already very needed.And why your wallet is still BCH UNLIMITED?This doesn't inspire confidence in success. You have no team to release your own wallet?

You have no team to release your own wallet?Some good questions there - you should post them on https://member.cash/t/Member where I'd be happy to discuss.

comments.author: LaaMos Seeth
comments.body: Quote from: FreeTrade on July 12, 2022, 12:21:31 AMQuote from: LaaMos Seeth on July 11, 2022, 11:41:36 AMHi.I don't want to offend you, but your previous project was unsuccessful - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1317918.msg60216031#msg60216031What guarantees success here?At the moment, your social network member.cash is full of useless spam, fraud ads, odd pictures and so on. But if you begin to control this, this will destroy the decentralization of the ecosystem (coin+social).But, nevertheless, I would like to mine a little coins for interest. But the difficulty is already very high for solo mining - 156. The network speed is around 9600 MH/s. Given that Intel 10900 gives about 30 MH, it is about 300-500 miners on the network. Not so much, but a pool is already very needed.And why your wallet is still BCH UNLIMITED?This doesn't inspire confidence in success. You have no team to release your own wallet?Answered here -https://member.cash/p/2b039c370dGot it. Thank you.By the way. Take a look at the Qortal project.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5258519.0First, I'm not the part of their team. I just find Qortal project very interesting.Why I recommend it to you ? Because they released web site hosting on their Qortal blockchain. Just imagine, you can start your social network Member.cash inside the blockchain. Truly decentralized.There is no centralized web hoster, as it is now. Each participant in the Qortal network (Minter) is a component of hosting. This will be a very interesting experiment.And nothing is required of you, no fee. Everything is free.https://wiki.qortal.org/doku.php?id=how_to_host_your_public_dataI'll duplicate the answer to https://member.cash/

comments.author: wanganxiu
comments.body: I feel like this project is a scam. The developers have not released the total supply and detailed distribution of this coin. How much was pre-mined? White Paper None of these. Very opaque.

comments.author: FreeTrade
comments.body: Quote from: wanganxiu on July 14, 2022, 09:43:18 PMI feel like this project is a scam. The developers have not released the total supply and detailed distribution of this coin. How much was pre-mined? White Paper None of these. Very opaque.The information is a little distributed at the moment, but all questions are being answered at the member.cash forum at https://member.cash/t/memberThis was posted over a month ago -https://member.cash/p/fd550b2244And recently -https://member.cash/p/583f5073ebIf you have questions, ask at the forum at https://member.cash/t/member - I'll be happy to answer them.

comments.author: wanganxiu
comments.body: Thank you for your answer, I found the answer; This is a good project
